body_html:
@pjh5, I get this warning now:
WARNING:root:This caffe2 python run does not have GPU support. Will run in CPU only mode. WARNING:root:Debug message: libcurand.so.9.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory CRITICAL:root:Cannot load caffe2.python. Error: /home/sarvagya/anaconda3/envs/caffe2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/caffe2/python/../../../../libcaffe2.so: undefined symbol: _ZN6google15SetUsageMessageERKSs

Also, CUDA toolkit, cudnn and nccl are present in the usr/lib folder. like libcudnn.so
body:
@pjh5, I get this warning now:
`WARNING:root:This caffe2 python run does not have GPU support. Will run in CPU only mode.
WARNING:root:Debug message: libcurand.so.9.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
CRITICAL:root:Cannot load caffe2.python. Error: /home/sarvagya/anaconda3/envs/caffe2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/caffe2/python/../../../../libcaffe2.so: undefined symbol: _ZN6google15SetUsageMessageERKSs`

Also, CUDA toolkit, cudnn and nccl are present in the usr/lib folder. like `libcudnn.so`
